mapper.insert: insert into HEAVY_METAL_ESTIMATE (ID, SEC_ID, HM_ID, MONITOR_TIME, EVALUATION_METHOD, CADMIUM_SHMPI, MERCURY_SHMPI, ARSENIC_SHMPI, COPPER_SHMPI, LEAD_SHMPI, CHROMIUM_SHMPI, ZINC_SHMPI, NICKEL_SHMPI, CPI, DOCP, CADMIUM_ERI, MERCURY_ERI, ARSENIC_ERI, COPPER_ERI, LEAD_ERI, CHROMIUM_ERI, ZINC_ERI, NICKEL_ERI, CERI, CPER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monitorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{evaluationMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cadmiumShmpi,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{mercuryShmpi,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{arsenicShmpi,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{copperShmpi,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{leadShmpi,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{chromiumShmpi,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{zincShmpi,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{nickelShmpi,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{cpi,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{docp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cadmiumEri,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{mercuryEri,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{arsenicEri,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{copperEri,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{leadEri,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{chromiumEri,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{zincEri,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{nickelEri,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ceri,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{cper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update HEAVY_METAL_ESTIMATE set SEC_ID = #{secId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HM_ID = #{hmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONITOR_TIME = #{monitorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EVALUATION_METHOD = #{evaluationMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CADMIUM_SHMPI = #{cadmiumShmpi,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, MERCURY_SHMPI = #{mercuryShmpi,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ARSENIC_SHMPI = #{arsenicShmpi,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, COPPER_SHMPI = #{copperShmpi,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, LEAD_SHMPI = #{leadShmpi,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CHROMIUM_SHMPI = #{chromiumShmpi,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ZINC_SHMPI = #{zincShmpi,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, NICKEL_SHMPI = #{nickelShmpi,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CPI = #{cpi,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, DOCP = #{docp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CADMIUM_ERI = #{cadmiumEri,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, MERCURY_ERI = #{mercuryEri,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ARSENIC_ERI = #{arsenicEri,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, COPPER_ERI = #{copperEri,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, LEAD_ERI = #{leadEri,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CHROMIUM_ERI = #{chromiumEri,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ZINC_ERI = #{zincEri,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, NICKEL_ERI = #{nickelEri,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CERI = #{ceri,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CPER = #{cper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, SEC_ID, HM_ID, MONITOR_TIME, EVALUATION_METHOD, CADMIUM_SHMPI, MERCURY_SHMPI, ARSENIC_SHMPI, COPPER_SHMPI, LEAD_SHMPI, CHROMIUM_SHMPI, ZINC_SHMPI, NICKEL_SHMPI, CPI, DOCP, CADMIUM_ERI, MERCURY_ERI, ARSENIC_ERI, COPPER_ERI, LEAD_ERI, CHROMIUM_ERI, ZINC_ERI, NICKEL_ERI, CERI, CPER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS from HEAVY_METAL_ESTIMATE where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
